selected_quotes: We need more scientists who can explain what they're doing in compelling understandable language ~ J. Napolitano
We need more scientists in the public square.
Janet Napolitano for The Conversation: we need more scientists in the public square
When the voices of scientists are not heard in the dialogue, there is a price to pay.
Written about the US, but just as true for Canada. #VoteForScience #AnyoneButHarper #MuzzlesForScience
